title: Promo games and trolls?
body:
Why is it whenever you get into promos you get matched with trolls? is rito doing this on purpose? is this the only way for them to stop me getting the challenger i deserve? well i know your secrets now rito, stop it now or i'll main teemo.
(I'll do it swear on me mom)

replies.body:
Its just the way the world works...

I finally got into my promos to get silver, i had been going Leona support (even though my main position is mid) for aaaaaages because no one ever picked a tank, but after we had a Fizz... A FIZZ feed in mid, i decided 'fuck it, if you want something done, do it yourself.' so i went mid next game, and i needed the win for my promos, in champ select we get a good team, but are in serious need of a tank, the last pick was our top who had Xin as their preferred champ, Xin isn't quite tanky enough, so some of our team asked them if they could go tank.... no communication at all. Then 3 seconds before the timer stopped, they switch to Quinn and lock in.. Then start the game, no communication, feed mundo then AFK for the rest of the game....


The universe just saves all the retards for promos.. thats just how it works.
Some people use LoLNexus to check game stats, and they can see if you're in promos. Some people are just tards and want people to not climb on purpose
